snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY VII – iOS Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
FINAL FANTASY VII, the most critically acclaimed RPG of all time, comes to your mobile device. Take the epic adventure that defined the genre on the go by downloading it now on the App Store.

Download Now on the App Store: http://bit.ly/ffviimobile

Visit the Official Facebook Page: 
https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyvii

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/FinalFantasy

Watch the FINAL FANTASY VII Remake Trailer:
 http://bit.ly/ffviiremake

Stay up to date with the latest FINAL FANTASY news by downloading the FINAL FANTASY Portal App, FREE on the App Store and Google Play.
